meanings.sent1: She kept misstyling her hair, but eventually got the hang of it.
meanings.sent2: He tends to misstyle his outfits when he's in a rush.
meanings.sent3: The fashion show turned into a comedy when the models started misstyling their looks on purpose.
meanings.sent4: Her attempt to follow the latest trend ended up misstyling her entire wardrobe.
meanings.sent5: The stylist's mistake in misstyling the celebrity's hair became the talk of the town.

meanings.definition: The act of styling something incorrectly.
meanings.sent1: Her misstyling of the mannequin's outfit was quickly corrected by the store manager.
meanings.sent2: The misstyling of the room's decor made it look chaotic and messy.
meanings.sent3: The misstyling of the cake with too many decorations made it look like a colorful disaster.
meanings.sent4: The misstyling of the garden with mismatched plants created a whimsical and unique landscape.
meanings.sent5: The misstyling of the advertisement led to confusion among the customers.
